translation.welcome: Hello and welcome to this website!
translation.welcome_desc: Here you can find something simple and amazing :)
translation.technologies: Technologies stack: React, TypeScript, Redux TK, React Router DOM (6.4+version with new features), react-i18next and Material UI. Simple and REACTive -:
translation.adaptive: This website has adaptive design, so user can use any device (min-width: 320px, max-width: 1600px).
translation.news_desc: News page fetch primitive news ( using loader) and render them. Redux is used to save some values between rerender.
translation.news_task: User can delete some news and load more news on button click. Also, news array is saved globally to avoid data loss and extra fetch process.
translation.news_limitation: P.S. Data from API isn't translatable in client side, backend translation isn't provided
translation.language_desc: It's implemented using react-i18next and provide supporting for Ukrainian and English
translation.prof_login_desc: User has to sign up (login: 'admin', password: '12345') to have access to profile. At the end user will see dummy profile page.
translation.no_more: You have watched and deleted all available news

translation.signIn_text: Sign in using your login and password
translation.signIn_error: Login or password is incorrect. Please try again
translation.error_desc: If error persists, please, contact with administrator:
